HediffDef.label: synaptic overload (minor)
HediffDef.description: A consequence of having too many integrated signal chips, constant stimulation of the nervous system leads to headaches and difficulty concentrating.

HediffDef.label: synaptic overload (major)
HediffDef.description: A consequence of having too many integrated signal chips, further degradation of the nervous system leads to worsened headaches and a decrease in overall focus.

HediffDef.label: synaptic overload (extreme)
HediffDef.description: A consequence of having too many integrated signal chips, characterized by twitching and trembling, overall body pain, and severe mental fatigue.
